nodes.text: The Vapor Room was a drinking establishment in Cloud City.
This industrial cantina was located in an unused portion of a Bespin construction platform, filled with tanks and pipes, and was known to serve a wide variety of illegal drinks.
The Vapor Room was a "watering hole" for Ugnaughts residing in Cloud City, giving them a break from the regular construction work on the larger settlement.
The crew of Rogue Shadow located Rahm Kota there.
